# Shiny Application & User Guide

To access the interactive visualizations created for VAST Challenge 2021 and visualize any patterns, behaviors or anomalies, please visit the **[Shiny App](https://al-lim.shinyapps.io/team4_ISSS608_2021/)**.

A detailed **[User Guide](UserGuide.html)** is prepared to help get the users started on using the Shiny application.
